description: Run like the wind in the all-new Hightail 2N1 short - a lean, mean, running machine designed for increased stride and mobility. Featuring a low-profile design and just-what-you-need feature set, Hightail kicks all kinds of ass on the trail, track or treadmill. Equipped with a Kinetic HD mesh liner and their advanced BallPark Pouch PRO, runners will experience an elevated level of support and stability. Plus, with a contoured leg vent and ultra-light mechanical stretch-woven shell, there's no telling how fast Hightail can go.
name: Saxx Underwear Hightail 2n1 Run Shorts, 5" Inseam - Mens
